name: ZESCO Limited
description: Zambia Electricity Supply Corporation â€” the national electricity utility responsible for generation, transmission and distribution.

name: Industrial Development Corporation
description: IDC is the Government of Zambia's investment and holding company, managing a portfolio of strategic state-owned enterprises.

name: Zambia National Commercial Bank (ZANACO)
description: Zambia's largest commercial bank with the widest network of branches and ATMs across the country.

name: Zambia Railways Limited
description: State-owned railway operator providing freight and passenger rail services across Zambia and into neighbouring countries.

name: ZCCM Investments Holdings PLC
description: ZCCM-IH is a mining investment holding company listed on the Lusaka Securities Exchange and London Stock Exchange, managing the Government of Zambia's equity interests in major copper, cobalt and other mineral mining ventures.

name: Zambia Gold Company Limited
description: Zambia Gold Company Limited is a 100% state-owned gold mining and refining company established to consolidate and manage the Government of Zambia's interests in gold production, artisanal and small-scale mining formalisation, and gold export across the country.
